abstract: Steve Hilton, former chief adviser to British Prime Min David Cameron, is in Washington, DC, celebrating release of his book More Human: Designing a World Where People Come First, timely and powerful publication that calls for smaller-scaled living and governance.
lead_paragraph: A book party for Steve Hilton, a former top aide to Prime Minister David Cameron of Britain, draws the D.C. chattering class.
